description: Transformers: the model-definition framework for state-of-the-art machine learning models in text, vision, audio, and multimodal models, for both inference and training.

This is an intelligent system to optimize food redistribution, reducing waste and improving delivery efficiency using machine learning and optimization algorithms. It classifies food, predicts demand, and plans logistics through simulations in Python-based frameworks. Visualization and dashboards enable monitoring, analysis, and scalable,  testing.

This repository contains the complete implementation and dataset for a comparative study on machine learning and deep learning models applied to resting-state EEG data of adolescents. The research investigates the performance of models such as SVM, DNN, Random Forest, Logistic Regression, and KNN in classifying eyes-open and eyes-closed brain state

Exploratory data analysis and machine learning pipeline for financial mid-price movement prediction. Includes PCA feature selection, classification models (Random Forest, Logistic Regression, XGBoost, LightGBM, CatBoost), and backtesting framework for signal-based trading strategies.
A skeleton project containing a framework for defining datasets, models and training that can be built off of for future machine learning projects
A Rust powered PyTorch-like Machine Learning framework.
A systematic replication study of machine learning research papers to validate reproducibility and benchmark implementation challenges across different architectures and frameworks.
A machine learning-based video super resolution and frame interpolation framework. Est. Hack the Valley II, 2018.
Machine Learning Framework
Heart Hybrid Classifier is a machine learning framework focused on cardiovascular risk prediction. The goal is to evaluate accuracy and interpretability of the models in a clinical setting.
This App uses ML.NET Machine Learning framework to rate sentiments based on Yelp Customer reviews dataset
An AI based Smart Waste Classification System built on top of Python's Web Framework Django with several Web Technologies  with additional techs of Machine Learning models

MLX, PyTorch & Hugging Face Demo on MacBook Pro M4 Pro: A comprehensive demonstration showcasing Apple Silicon's machine learning capabilities through three frameworks - MLX for native optimization, PyTorch with MPS for GPU acceleration, and Hugging Face for pre-trained models. Leverages unified memory architecture.
A comprehensive machine learning framework for quantitative trading strategies

It is a decision-support framework that integrates Genetic Algorithm (GA) for feature subset optimization with diverse Machine Learning models (KNN, SVM, Random Forest, XGBoost) as evaluators. By combining evolutionary search with predictive modeling, it aims to identify robust signals, impr

The widespread use of digital media and social networking platforms has made it extremely easy to share information instantly with a global audience. While this has many benefits, it has also given rise to the massive spread of misinformation, rumors, and fake news.
A Julia machine learning framework
A machine learning-based video super resolution and frame interpolation framework. Est. Hack the Valley II, 2018.

Engineered an end-to-end backtesting framework to validate a machine learning trading strategy for BTC/USDT. Developed a data pipeline from the Binance API, trained an XGBoost model, and simulated trades with transaction costs. The system quantified the strategy's performance, revealing a Sharpe Ratio of -12.9 and preventing potential capital loss.
A text-processing framework for machine-learning workflows based in python
Geospatial Machine Learning Framework for Maritime Anomaly Detection and Illegal Fishing Prevention

This project focuses on developing an automated system for disease diagnosis using medical imaging techniques. Leveraging advanced machine learning and deep learning frameworks, the system is designed to analyze medical images such as X-rays, MRIs, or CT scans to accurately identify and classify various diseases.

This project develops a computational framework to detect autoimmune disorders using bioinformatics and machine learning techniques. It integrates genetic, proteomic, and clinical data to identify biomarkers, analyze immune response patterns, and predict disease susceptibility.

Curated machine learning and AI roadmapfree, open-access resources spanning foundational math, tutorials, books, frameworks, LLMs, interactive demos, and EdTech tools. Start anywhere, level up everywhere.

This project is an  end-to-end Machine Learning web application that predicts  medical insurance costs  based on user health data such as age, BMI, smoking habits, and region.   It combines Data Science , Flask Web Framework , Interactive Frontend (HTML/CSS/JS) , and  Docker for deployment  showcasing both  AI and DevOps skills.
3DAnimals: A machine learning framework for reconstructing articulated 3D animals from images

A fast, distributed, high performance gradient boosting (GBT, GBDT, GBRT, GBM or MART) framework based on decision tree algorithms, used for ranking, classification and many other machine learning tasks.
AutoSCEP - Machine learning-enabled automated framework for large-scale transmission capacity expansion planning with statistical parameter selection
A web framework for cervical cancer detection using machine learning

This repository contains Machine learning framework for cancer drug discovery integrating QSAR modelling, ensemble learning, and transfer learning to predict adverse drug events and identify safe lead compounds. Implements molecular descriptor generation, data segmentation, and DNN-based safety modelling for drug development.
PArallel Distributed Deep LEarning: Machine Learning Framework from Industrial Practice &
This repository contains the code and analysis for a quantitative research project aimed at empirically validating the Fama-French asset pricing framework using modern machine learning techniques.

This repository serves as a hub for my ML/AI explorations, implementations, and tutorials. It includes:   Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) projects  Machine Learning models for predictions and classifications  Deep Learning projects using frameworks like TensorFlow, PyTorch, and Hugging Face  Natural Language Processing (NLP) applications
This repository contains the data-driven framework and machine learning models for the design and optimization of Cr/NNN catalysts for ethylene oligomerization.

Research platform for three-state logic systems in machine learning, with applications to GANs, uncertainty quantification, and robust AI. Features interactive CLI, web API, and comprehensive analysis tools.Lots of analysis and work on which to engage via robust forks.

A deep learning framework for predicting 90-day post-stroke functional outcomes (mRS 02 vs. 36) using multimodal data integration. The pipeline combines non-contrast CT, multimodal MRI sequences (DWI, ADC, FLAIR), and structured clinical variables through late-fusion 3D ResNet models and machine-learning classifiers.
A TranscriptomicMachine Learning Framework Reveals TDP-43Driven Molecular Signatures in NeurodegenerationandCancer
A machine learning framework in Zig.

Developed an end-to-end machine learning framework to predict borrower default risk using logistic regression and feature engineering. Applied EDA and WOE binning for interpretability, and validated models with AUC, Gini, KS, and PSI to ensure robust performance over time.
A machine learning project that implements an ensemble framework for Autism Spectrum Disorder prediction using multi-modal data. Developed as part of my Machine Learning Lab course.
An open-source framework for training AI agents in realistic dogfight scenarios using reinforcement learning, JSBSim flight dynamics, and Azure Machine Learning integration.
A comprehensive collection of practical machine learning examples using popular frameworks and libraries.
Automatic quantification and classification of geometric distortion in prostate diffusion-weighted MRI using an ensemble machine learning framework.

This project demonstrates how to detect potential money laundering activities in financial transactions using Python and machine learning techniques. It combines supervised classification (with labeled data) and unsupervised anomaly detection (for unlabeled data) to build a practical anti-money laundering (AML) monitoring framework.
An opinionated machine learning framework.

This project combines machine learning with blockchain to build a secure credit card fraud detection framework. ML algorithms detect fraudulent transactions, while blockchain provides decentralized trust and immutable records, ensuring reliable, real-time financial protection.

This repository showcases a machine learning pipeline for galaxy classification using data from the Sloan Digital Sky Survey (SDSS) Data Release 18 (DR18). It utilises XGBoost, a gradient boosting framework, to perform a binary classification task.

This repository calibrates and validates the hybrid model combining a conceptual model (GR4J) with a physically-based model (HyMoLAP) for rainfall-runoff systems, presenting a promising new model for hydrological simulation. The framework is then further enhanced by integrating machine learning techniques such as SVR and CNN. Moreover, UQ is buit.

Capstone project for the Imperial College London AI & Machine Learning Certificate, showcasing end-to-end ML development  from data preparation to model training, evaluation, and insights using Python and modern ML frameworks.

The widespread use of digital media and social networking platforms has made it extremely easy to share information instantly with a global audience. While this has many benefits, it has also given rise to the massive spread of misinformation, rumors, and fake news.

A machine learning framework for simulating and predicting random walks. Includes parameterized bias sampling, enhanced feature engineering, multi-dimensional support, and real-world applications such as financial markets, IoT sensor drift, healthcare monitoring, and cybersecurity.
This project demonstrates a simple example of using machine learning in Rust with the Linfa framework. It trains a linear regression model to map input features to target values.
Comprehensive machine learning framework for analyzing physiological signals to predict stress recovery patterns
This repository contains a simple To-Do app made with a Next.js framework and a FastAPI connection to a Machine Learning model, made in preparation for the Junction 2025 hackathon.

Machine learning framework to predict ICU and hospital length of stay in infants with congenital heart disease undergoing cardiac surgery. Combines representation learning (MKL), clustering, and local models to provide interpretable, personalized predictions from perioperative data.
A machine learning framework for training neural networks.
Scalable, Self-Optimizing Distributed-Processing Framework for Intelligent RadixPrimitives Engine implementing modern Machine-Learning patterns featuring Machine-Learning capabilities
A privacy-preserving, decentralized machine learning framework that enables multiple clients to collaboratively train models without sharing raw data.
Interpretable Machine Learning Framework for Designing High Ionic Conductivity in Low-Temperature Lithium-Ion Battery Electrolytes
Translation exploration with Transformers and Machine Learning Experimentation Platfroms
Client Retention Strategy App - A comprehensive churn prediction and retention management platform featuring machine learning models, data processing pipelines, and project planning frameworks.
Open-source machine learning framework for Java. Designed with speed and lightweight in mind.

scikit-learn_bench benchmarks various implementations of machine learning algorithms across data analytics frameworks. It currently support the scikit-learn, DAAL4PY, cuML, and XGBoost frameworks for commonly used machine learning algorithms.
A machine learning framework to generate quasar spectra

This project developed a machine-learning-based predictive maintenance framework to detect anomalous behaviour in ship engine performance. The goal was to identify early warning signs of mechanical faults to reduce downtime, improve safety, and optimise operational efficiency across a commercial shipping fleet.
A robust, RFC-compliant HTTP server built from scratch in Pythonno frameworks, fully extensible for machine learning and fintech APIs.

This repository contains a set of CMSSW modules and helper scripts designed to preprocess particle physics data (specifically from MINIAOD files) into flat `TTree` ROOT files. The resulting files are optimized for subsequent analysis, particularly for training machine learning models. The framework is configured to handle both AK8 and AK15 jets.
Foam-Agent: An end-to-end, composable multi-agent framework for automating CFD simulations in OpenFOAM. NeurIPS 2025 Machine Learning and the Physical Sciences Workshop.
A Python Framework for Multi-Agent Programming with Machine Learning

Built a machine learning framework to predict obesity risk across seven categories using data from 20,757 individuals. Implemented six classification algorithms with 10-fold cross-validation, engineered composite features (BMI, Lifestyle Score, Activity Balance), and achieved 90.56% accuracy using Random Forest classifier with 0.9055 F1-score.

This project is a hands-on application of machine learning to solve a real-world problem: predicting laptop prices. It features a Random Forest Regressor model, trained on a dataset of laptop specifications, and deployed as a simple web application using the Flask framework. The entire workflow, from data cleaning in a Jupyter Notebook to function

A powerful hybrid machine learning framework combining the predictive strengths of multiple algorithms using Voting, Blending, and Stacking. Includes FastAPI for real-time inference and Streamlit for interactive visualizationclean, modular, and production-ready
This project contain data for research A Domain-Aware and Calibrated Machine Learning Framework for Aqueous Solubility Prediction

This repository implements a Machine Translation system using a Sequence-to-Sequence (Seq2Seq) architecture with attention mechanism for translating English sentences to Hindi. Built using deep learning frameworks, the project includes data preprocessing, model training, evaluation, and inference scripts.

A comprehensive portfolio showcasing end-to-end Machine Learning projects, including data preprocessing, model development, deployment, and MLOps practices. This repository highlights my expertise in machine learning algorithms, deep learning frameworks, cloud deployment, and scalable model pipelines.

SPARK is a extensible energy analytics platform designed for processing large-scale renewable energy datasets using the Hadoop MapReduce framework. It offers data analytics, machine learning-based forecasting, and energy trend insights in a fully modular setup utilising Hadoop, MapReduce, Apache Spark complementing the Streamlit UI.
Project for Applied Machine Learning 2, attempting to discover optimal noise profiles through an uncertainty-aware multi-generator evolutionary framework for GANs.
...what? Bash is a Machine Learning framework, right?
An AI framework for analyzing the link between multi-omics data (SNP, DNA methylation) using classical machine learning models (LDA, HMM) and SOTA AI models (GPT, BERT, Enformer).

This project presents SecureScan, a hybrid framework for secure QR code scanning that integrates traditional URL validation, blacklist detection, and machine learning-based malicious URL analysis. The system ensures protection against phishing, malicious websites, and security vulnerabilities. Developed as a Final Year Project 2025.

This study presents a computational experiment demonstrating the violation of Bells Inequality through machine learning simulation. By modeling entangled particle correlations and applying data-driven analysis, the research shows how quantum mechanical predictions defy local realism. Using linear regression to approximate quantum correlations,
Folax (Finite Operator Learning with JAX) is a framework for solving and optimizing PDEs by integrating machine learning with numerical methods in computational mechanics.

Monocle  a modular framework for Computer Vision and Machine Learning pipelines. It unifies models, filters, and postprocessors through typed data contracts, enabling composable inference graphs, plugin extensions, and seamless integration across CV, OCR, LLM, and API systems.
A PyTorch based training framework for a Machine Learning Driving Simulator
Tensor library & inference framework for machine learning

Machine learning framework for Real Madrid player performance prediction. Position-specific models (RF, XGBoost, NN) with SHAP analysis across 8 seasons. 98.7% R for forwards. Includes weighted scoring systems and Docker deployment. 5,737 matches analyzed.
A non-intrusive cascading FFT-informed machine learning (FIML) framework for detecting both electrical and mechanical faults in squirrel-cage induction motors.
A comprehensive benchmarking framework for evaluating and comparing multiple machine learning models on credit card fraud detection

This repository explores Machine Learning through projects, scripts, and tutorials. It covers data preprocessing, model training, evaluation, and deployment using frameworks like scikit-learn, TensorFlow, and PyTorch, with applications in classification, regression, NLP, and computer vision.

A machine learning framework for detecting phishing URLs using multiple classifiers (MDC, Bayes, k-NN, SVM). Implements feature selection, dimensionality reduction, and class balancing techniques to improve accuracy and generalization.
A framework for encapsulating and representing detection results and metadata into interoperable records about analytics subjects that are detected by machine learning pipelines in the edge

QStruct is a scalable framework that integrates Hadoop, Spark, and Kafka with machine learning and quantum-inspired algorithms for RNA 3D structure prediction. It leverages HDFS for data storage, Spark for distributed training, and Kafka for real-time processing, enabling efficient, large-scale RNA analysis for drug discovery.

ModelFlex is a powerful web-based tool for optimizing machine learning models across different frameworks and target devices. It provides an intuitive interface for model compression, optimization, and deployment.

Perovskite solar cells (PSCs) have achieved outstanding efficiencies, but their instability under real-world conditions limits large-scale use. This study introduces a machine learningbased framework integrating surrogate modeling and multi-objective optimization to improve both efficiency and stability.

An empirical investigation into the emergence and evolution of ethical norms when AI systems are tasked with content moderation, examining how machine learning models develop and adapt moral frameworks through interaction.
